name: Kuwashii Visor
description: Developed by Ariake Technologies, the wearer exchanges full protective coverage for visibility, unencumbered mobility, and increased accuracy.
features: As a bonus action, you choose a creature you can see within 30m. For the next minute, you deal an extra 1d6 damage to the target whenever you hit it with a weapon attack, and you have advantage on any Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Survival) check you make to find it. You can use this feature 3 times per long rest.
